solution_line_template: A snake's head is one-tenth its length, which is {head_fraction_numerator}/{head_fraction_denominator}*{total_length} = <<{head_fraction_numerator}/{head_fraction_denominator}*{total_length}={head_length}>>{head_length} foot.
Since the snake's head is {head_length} foot, the rest of its body is {total_length}-{head_length} = <<{total_length}-{head_length}={body_length_minus_head}>>{body_length_minus_head} feet long.
